name: from_package
description: Creates a <%= doc_class_name %> using data from a package.

parameters.name: package_name
parameters.desc: The **package name** of the <%= doc_class_name %> you want to load.

parameters.name: team
parameters.desc: The <%= type 'Team'%> you want this <%= doc_class_name %> to belong to.

parameters.name: rank
parameters.desc: The <%= type 'Rank' %> you want this <%= doc_class_name %>.
